video_prompt: Crowds flow through a hyper-futuristic metropolis. Towering digital screens on skyscrapers dynamically shift, showcasing vibrant, moving content. Illuminated signs flicker and change. The city pulsates with continuous, integrated activity and light, constantly evolving.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Bustling, futuristic cityscape at street level, looking up at colossal, screen-covered skyscrapers. Dense urban environment with teeming crowds, illuminated signs, and crisscrossing cables. Cyberpunk/neo-futuristic aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: Crowds continuously flow and weave. Digital screens on skyscrapers dynamically shift, displaying vibrant, moving animations and content. Illuminated signs flicker, transition, and reconfigure. The city pulsates with ceaseless, evolving activity and light, every element undergoing constant, integrated change.
